text: Jews et dictus deus manus tied It est their manus tied down They condemned pro uttering such blasphemy! Instead His manus est wide open spending prout He testimentum. Pro certain, tuus Dominus revelations to vos causa multus de them plunge deeper into transgression disbelief! Consequently nos committed them animosity hatred themselves Feria Resurrection. Whenever they ignite flames war DEUS puts them! They roam terra wickedly DEUS dislikes evildoers
